mapper.insert:
insert into t_mortgage (borrow_id,has_house,has_house_mortgage,house_location,house_area,has_car,has_car_mortgage,car_no,car_value,addtime,addip) values (#{borrowId},#{hasHouse},#{hasHouseMortgage},#{houseLocation},#{houseArea},#{hasCar},#{hasCarMortgage},#{carNo},#{carValue},#{addtime},#{addip})
select last_insert_id() as id
